metadata.name: School, Apartments, and The Road Ahead #1/166
metadata.description:
School, Apartments, and The Road Ahead by Grant Yun

---
Collectors who own both “School & Apartments” and “The Road Ahead” are eligible to burn both pieces for “School, Apartments, and The Road Ahead.”

The burn will open at 6:30pm EDT and will be available for 24 hours. To qualify for the burn, users **must** have one edition each of “The Road Ahead” and “School & Apartments” in their **Nifty account.**

*Collectors with multiple eligible sets will need to burn each pair independently. Please follow the burn process once per pair. Click Request to Burn + Mint, repeat as needed.*
